janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha ha aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathwarunge upades ha manga penwima paridi kriyathmaka kerena me wadasatahanaharaha miyagiya ha aabadhitha ranawiru pawulwala suba sadhanaya apeksha karana bawa hethema jathika apekshawa pilibanda madhya madhyasthanaye adhyaksha jenaral lakshman hulugalla mahatha kiya.diwayinama aawaranaya wana andamin mema niwasa wyapruthiya kriyathmaka kerena athara ranawiru suba sadhana katayuthuª wenuwen rajya aaraksha amathyansha sewa wanitha eekakaya wishala karya bharayak itu karana bawa da lakshman hulugalla mahatha wadiduratath kiwe ya.jathika aarakshawa pilibanda madhya madhyasthanaye pawathi janamadhya hamuwakadi mema adahas pala wiya.
